decision_conditions: The submitted details of the noise impact assessment in pursuant to condition 6 of planning application Ref: 234491FUL dated 22/08/2024 are deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition.  The proposal would therefore fail to comply with policies 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 & D14 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Submission of a Noise Impact Assessment in pursuant to condition 6 of planning permission ref: 234491FUL dated 22/08/2024 for 'Conversion of two-storey single family dwellinghouse into three self-contained residential units; and single storey rear and side wrap around extension (following demolition of rear structures)'
